input.description: String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module. Example: BMC_A_System

output.description: String Value - The name of the adapter to be used by this process
XML document
XML document used to format an adapter response that has been mapped from the application field name(s) to the Concept elements
XML document that maps the normalized concept create value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept impact value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
String Value - The name of the schema with which to interact
XML document that maps the normalized concept assignment priority value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the fields defined as a query in the Incident Management Concept to the target application field(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept reported source value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept service type value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept status value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept status reason value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
String Value - The type of system defined within the Incident Management module
XML document that maps the normalized concept update value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept urgency value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
String Value -The version of the adapter in use
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized concept status reason value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
String Value - The configuration name to be supplied to the Change Management Module.
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)
String Value -The change id, used as a key value for incident/change associations.
String Value - The incident id, used as a key value for incident/change associations.
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific string that explains the value of success status.
XML document that maps the normalized template value(s) to the target application specific value(s)

input.value: **** Show contents of version after extraction from Global ******

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" encoding="UTF-8" /> <xsl:template match="/mappings"> <mappings> <xsl:for-each select="//node()[@version="default" or @version="${version}"]"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:for-each> </mappings> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This workflow will extract the configuration data for a given configuration name.
